Body:
master_file = os.path.join(os.getenv('PYPEIT_DEV'), 'Cooked',
    'shane_kast_blue', 'MasterTilts_A_1_01.fits')
slit_master_file = os.path.join(os.getenv('PYPEIT_DEV'), 'Cooked',
    'shane_kast_blue', 'MasterSlits_A_1_01.fits.gz')
slits = slittrace.SlitTraceSet.from_file(slit_master_file)
waveTilts = wavetilts.WaveTilts.from_file(master_file)
tilts = waveTilts.fit2tiltimg(slits.slit_img())
assert isinstance(tilts, np.ndarray)
cooked_required
